data_sources.description: Contains annotations for bounding boxes including how many are present in frames.
Sample image used for image generation via PS-GAN.
Contains synthesized images generated by the PS-GAN model.

data_variables.description: DataFrame containing training data with annotations of bounding boxes.
Path to the input image used to display and test synthesized results.

data_flow.flows_to: Processed for bounding box counts, later analyzed for model training.
Summarized to check the number of bounding boxes and frames.
Used in visualization of original image and synthesized results.

models.input_features: Input images with bounding boxes replaced by noise.
